meanings.definition: A support for the arms, typically attached to a seat or sofa.
meanings.sent1: The armrests on the chair were cushioned for comfort.
meanings.sent2: She leaned on the armrests while watching TV.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat used the armrests as a scratching post.
meanings.sent4: His words were like armrests, providing support in times of need.
meanings.sent5: The armrests felt like a warm embrace, easing her tired muscles.

meanings.definition: A horizontal piece at the end of a chair, sofa, or bench, on which one may rest an arm.
meanings.sent1: The wooden armrests of the bench were polished to a shine.
meanings.sent2: He placed his coffee cup on the armrests of the sofa.
meanings.sent3: The armrests of the chair doubled as a makeshift table for snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the armrests, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The armrests cradled his tired arms, offering a moment of relaxation.
